value.name: Agency suggests changes after 'Cops' crewman's death
value.description: Bryce Dion, 38, of Boston, was killed Aug. 26 while filming an attempted armed robbery at a fast-food restaurant when a stray bullet from an Omaha police officer slipped past his bulletproof vest.

value.name: Mickey Mouse, the most hateful state, the ‘Hippy Hippy Shake’: News from around our 50 states
value.description: The Omaha World-Herald reports that 38-year-old sound technician Bryce Dion was killed in August 2014 when police responded to an armed robbery in an Omaha restaurant. A lawyer for Dion’s family ...
